thread.title: Benjamin Andrew Salk
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by Benjamin Andrew Salk

author: Benjamin Andrew Salk
title: Benjamin Andrew Salk
text:
We made a last minute reservation and had absolutely no problems with the process of hiring the car even though we booked it just after landing (& still on the Tarmac)!
The front desk at Sydney's T2 were extremely friendly and gave exceptional customer service.
The car was clean, comfortable and just what we needed to get around Sydney for the weekend, given the inclement weather.
